title: Fulang-Chang and I
medium: In two parts, oil on composition board (1937) with painted mirror frame (added after 1939); and mirror with painted mirror frame (after 1939)
dimensions:
Framed painting, left 22 1/4 x 17 3/8 x 1 3/4" (56.5 x 44.1 x 4.4 cm); framed mirror, right 
25 1/4 x 19 x 1 3/4" (64.1 x 48.3 x 4.4 cm)
